application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Name: Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
TPAREA Ref: MAC.06.56Tree ref: A8Tree category: ADetails: M&C Order no: 06 Year: 1956

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: T.1 Thuja - Trim to shape while remaining in green (exempt).T.2 Purple Leaf Plum - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.3 Acer Negundo - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.G.1 Lawson Cypress x2 - Remove over-extended branches & deadwood (exempt).T.4 Thuja - Reduce height by 2m & trim sides to re-shape (exempt).T.5 Thuja - Crown lift to 4m from ground level (exempt).T.6 Lawson Cypress - Crown lift to 4m from ground level (exempt).T.7 Holly - Trim back lateral growth overhanging drive way up to a height of 6m.T.8 Sycamore - Trim back to boundary all lateral branches overhanging drive way of Coombe Court.
